lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Public Service New Mexico said a central feature of its reorganization concept would be to separate the company's electric utility operation into independent generation and distribution entities, creating the opportunity for a targeted 35 mln dlr a year rate decrease.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Its rates would be set by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission which regulates for wholesale electric power sales and transmission services.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Last month the governor said "I have outlined to PNM critical goals which I have asked them to cooperate with may administration in achieving" adding the goals include immediate rate reduction, stabilization of future rates and stimulation of business expansion.
